author: Reuters Editorial
title: Numis Corp Says It Expects To Report Six Months To March Revenue And Profits Significantly Ahead Of Comparable Period Last Year​
text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Numis Corporation Plc:
* TRADING UPDATE * SAYS EXPECTING TO REPORT REVENUE AND PROFITS SIGNIFICANTLY AHEAD OF COMPARABLE PERIOD LAST YEAR
* ‍EXPECTING TO REPORT SIX MONTHS TO MARCH REVENUE AND PROFITS SIGNIFICANTLY AHEAD OF COMPARABLE PERIOD LAST YEAR​
* ‍TRANSACTION VOLUMES ACROSS OUR CAPITAL MARKETS AND M&A ACTIVITIES HAVE BEEN STRONG THROUGHOUT H1​
* NUMIS CORPORATION - OUTLOOK REMAINS POSITIVE WITH STRONG NEAR TERM PIPELINE OF TRANSACTION OPPORTUNITIES EXPECTED TO SUPPORT ROBUST START TO H2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
